description:
Digital Assets Power Play Ltd. (DPP) is the leading developer of algorithmic crypto trading tools, services, and software. The DPP platform is aimed at enhancing crypto trading processes and optimizing algorithmic trading strategies. Our mission is to empower traders to take control of the crypto market. DPP offers a full suite of revolutionary and intuitive tools for algo strategy creation, DPP DataStreams, DPP Historical, DPP Trader+, DPP TradeVenue and DPP Coinvestor. DPP DataStreams is available now: https://platform.dapowerplay.com/services/basic.

DPP tokens provide access to DPP DataStreams and other services, while also providing a payment method for co-investing into third-party algorithmic strategies. Customers will also have the added benefit of an additional 15% bonus for all payments made in DPP Tokens. Our goal is to create a self-sustaining economy where DPP tokens will be the primary exchange of value across all five services within the DPP platform ecosystem.
name: Digital Assets Power Play
